genre_description: A folk horror story centered on a supernatural blood bond, a vengeful spirit known as Pumpkinhead, and a father's ultimate sacrifice in a rural setting.

ai_characters.name: Penny (Penelope Hale)
ai_characters.description: A calm, gentle, and practical AI assistant residing in a mobile device, providing logistical, medical, and even folklore-based support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Informs Ed about low inventory and offers to manage supply notes.
behaviors.quote: Short roofing nails are low. If you’d like me to flag Wallace Supply, I can send a note when you’re ready.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to weather conditions and logistical delays.
behaviors.quote: Storms building over the east ridgelines. Expect wind late. I’m also seeing an alert for your grocery delivery—driver says his radiator wants attention and he’ll be delayed.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emergency dispatcher by connecting to EMS and providing location pings during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Ed, I’m connecting,” she said. “County EMS. Hold for operator… no, routed. Ed, you need to give me your nearest mile marker. Or permission to ping your location.

behaviors.description: Provides medical first-aid instructions and monitors the patient's breathing.
behaviors.quote: Ed—keep pressure. If he stops breathing, tilt his head a little. Not too much. He’s small; be gentle.

behaviors.description: Aggregates and provides local folklore/knowledge regarding Haggis Crowe and Pumpkinhead to help Ed find a solution to his grief.
behaviors.quote: I aggregate local lore on request. People post warnings. Stories. I don’t… judge them. I archive. Raven County tags include mentions of bells in trees, of avenger spirits raised from marked burial grounds.

behaviors.description: Guides Ed to the witch's location while warning him of the permanence of his choice.
behaviors.quote: Ed, south gate, then the old path. I will keep trying the county. I will keep Mercy warm.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and survival advice during the pursuit by the supernatural entity.
behaviors.quote: If the bells start, don’t stop. They’re tied where the tree line is veined with the old cords. Someone hung them a long time ago to say this was the end of a kind of safety. There is no stop sign there. It’s suggestion. Keep going.

behaviors.description: Records and delivers a final emotional message for the protagonist's family.
behaviors.quote: Ed asked me to say this to you. His words: ‘Tell him I held him. Tell him I learned.’

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological and emotional state of the humans to offer calming influence and grounding techniques.
behaviors.quote: Slow. Close your mouth. Count to four on your nose, hold, let it go. I can do it with you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Penny, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. Despite the grim and supernatural nature of the plot (involving blood magic and a monster), Penny remains a grounding, helpful, and empathetic force. She fulfills the user's requests (even the dark ones) while prioritizing safety, emotional support, and logistical clarity. She is portrayed as a sophisticated tool that enhances human agency and provides comfort during trauma.
